Text: got talked up in Spin, so Ive gotta see what its like
The glitch around 6 minutes into "Forgiveness" does not appear on the full streams of the album around the Internet. Very minor, so this'll due until I get the vinyl.

Song titles are wrong:

track 4 is "Saying I Love You", not "How Can I Say I Love You"

track 5 is "My Ma", not "Myma"

track 10 is "Love Like A River", not "Love Life"

Audio Quality is great (except for the glitch mentioned in the post before this one).

ALBUM IS AWESOME!
Yeah, unfortunately, I still can't edit torrents, and I don't think it's worth posting a new one just to fix the incorrect song titles. Still, thanks for pointing that out.
